title: Cinema Craft Encoder SP2 v1.00.01.01.rar
description:
<< Introduction >>

  Cinema Craft Encoder SP2 is a software that converts AVI and QuickTime
  files into MPEG-2 or MPEG-1 format.

  Cinema Craft Encoder SP2 comprises standalone program and Adobe
  Premiere plug-in program. Both are included in the setup program.

<< Operation Environment >>

  The following hardware and software are required to use Cinema Craft
  Encoder SP2.

  - A processor that supports SSE or Enhanced 3D Now !
  - 512MB of RAM
  - Microsoft Windows Vista or Microsoft Windows XP
  - Adobe Premiere Pro/Pro 1.5/Pro 2.0/Pro CS3 for Plug-in version
  - QuickTime 7 (or later) to encode QuickTime files

<< Specification >>

 - Compression Method
     System            ISO/IEC 13818-1 | ITU-T Rec. H.222.0 (Program Stream only)
                       ISO/IEC 11172-1
     Video             ISO/IEC 13818-2 | ITU-T Rec. H.262 (MP@ML)
                       ISO/IEC 11172-2
     Audio             ISO/IEC 11172-3 (Layer 2)

 - Output Video format
    Encoding method    Constant Bitrate (CBR) (One pass) or (Multipass)
                       Variable Bitrate (VBR) (One pass) or (Multipass)
    Bitrate            maximum 15 Mbits/sec
    Frame Rate         23.976/24/25/29.97/30(frames/sec)
    Aspect ratio       SAR 1:1, DAR 4:3, DAR 16:9 or DAR 2.21:1
    GOP structure      I, P frame interval (M) : 1..3
                       I frame interval (N) : max 15 (a multiple of M)

 - Output audio format
    Bitrate(*)         64/96/112/128/160/192/224/256/320/384 (kbits/sec)
    Sampling Frequency 32/44.1/48 (kHz)
    Quantization bits  16 bits
    Mode               Stereo, Joint stereo, Dual channel, Monaural

  (*) In the case of one channel, the bitrate is half of each.



It includes the v1.00.01.01 trial version with a cracked DLL. Clean, NO VIRUS!

Enjoy!
